author: Taufik Nurrohman
description: Load pages asynchronously using AJAX while maintaining the principles of progressive enhancement.
name: @taufik-nurrohman/f3h

scripts.html:fix: rm _index.html && rm example-1/_style.html && mv example-4/test.css.html example-4/test.css && mv example-4/test.js.html example-4/test.js && mv example-5/index.php.html example-5/index.php && mv example-5/log.html example-5/log && mv example-6/index.php.html example-6/index.php && mv example-11/index.php.html example-11/index.php && mv example-11/test.php.html example-11/test.php && mv example-12/index.php.html example-12/index.php && mv example-13/test.css.html example-13/test.css && mv example-13/test.js.html example-13/test.js
